description: Manage a protection container mapping for a protection container.

commands.name: az site-recovery protection-container mapping create
commands.summary: Create operation to create a protection container mapping.
commands.syntax:
az site-recovery protection-container mapping create --fabric-name
                                                     --mapping-name
                                                     --protection-container
                                                     --resource-group
                                                     --vault-name
                                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                     [--policy-id]
                                                     [--provider-input]
                                                     [--target-container]
examples: az site-recovery protection-container mapping create -g rg --fabric-name fabric1_name -n container_mapping1_name --protection-container container1_name --vault-name vault_name --policy-id policy_id --provider-input '{a2a:{agent-auto-update-status:Disabled}}' --target-container container2_id

az site-recovery protection-container mapping create -g "rg" --fabric-name "fabric_name" -n "container_mapping_name" --protection-container "container_name" --vault-name "vault_name" --policy-id "policy_id" --target-container "Microsoft Azure" --provider-input '{hyper-v-replica-azure:""}'

az site-recovery protection-container mapping create -g "rg" --fabric-name "fabric_name" -n "container_mapping_name" --protection-container "container_name" --vault-name "vault_name" --policy-id "policy_id" --target-container "Microsoft Azure" --provider-input '{in-mage-rcm:{enable-agent-auto-upgrade:true}}'

commands.name: az site-recovery protection-container mapping delete
commands.summary: Delete operation to purge(force delete) a protection container mapping.
commands.syntax:
az site-recovery protection-container mapping delete [--fabric-name]
                                                     [--ids]
                                                     [--mapping-name]
                                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                     [--protection-container]
                                                     [--resource-group]
                                                     [--subscription]
                                                     [--vault-name]
                                                     [--yes]
examples: az site-recovery protection-container mapping delete -g rg --fabric-name fabric1_name -n container_mapping1_name --protection-container container1_name --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery protection-container mapping list
commands.summary: List the protection container mappings for a protection container.
examples: az site-recovery protection-container mapping list -g rg --fabric-name fabric_source_name --protection-container container_source_name --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery protection-container mapping remove
commands.summary: The operation to delete or remove a protection container mapping.
commands.syntax:
az site-recovery protection-container mapping remove [--fabric-name]
                                                     [--ids]
                                                     [--mapping-name]
                                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                     [--protection-container]
                                                     [--provider-input]
                                                     [--resource-group]
                                                     [--subscription]
                                                     [--vault-name]
examples: az site-recovery protection-container mapping remove -g rg --fabric-name fabric_source_name -n container_mapping_source_name --protection-container container_source_name --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery protection-container mapping show
commands.summary: Get the details of a protection container mapping.
examples: az site-recovery protection-container mapping show -g rg --fabric-name fabric_source_name -n container_mapping_source_name --protection-container container_source_name --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery protection-container mapping update
commands.summary: Update operation to create a protection container mapping.
commands.syntax:
az site-recovery protection-container mapping update [--add]
                                                     [--fabric-name]
                                                     [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                     [--ids]
                                                     [--mapping-name]
                                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                     [--policy-id]
                                                     [--protection-container]
                                                     [--provider-input]
                                                     [--remove]
                                                     [--resource-group]
                                                     [--set]
                                                     [--subscription]
                                                     [--target-container]
                                                     [--vault-name]
examples: az site-recovery protection-container mapping update -g rg --fabric-name fabric_source_name -n container_mapping_source_name --protection-container container_source_name --vault-name vault_name --policy-id policy_id --provider-input '{a2a:{agent-auto-update-status:Enabled}}' --target-container container_recovery_id
